column5: At least to this North American's eyes.  The Swiss sport of Hornussen was just shown on Daily Planet.    Anybody got room for a Hornussen field?
That's different! We should start a thread for it! We can discuss trades, salaries and coaching changes lol  G
Well, it's different to say the least.  I think if I tried that, my back would just keep unwinding and I'd spin off like a Tazmanian devil.
